data.title: The Formula (Movie) Cast
data.meta_description: Cast members details for The Formula. Get actor roles, casting info, images and more. Explore the cast of characters, their bios and filmography.
data.text:
George C. Scott

as Barney Caine

George C. Scott plays Barney Caine, a character caught in a complex web of intrigue and deception.

Marlon Brando

as Adam Steiffel

Marlon Brando portrays Adam Steiffel, a key figure entangled in the mysterious formula at the center of the plot.

Marthe Keller

as Lisa

Marthe Keller takes on the role of Lisa, a character whose involvement adds layers to the unfolding drama.

Beatrice Straight portrays Kay Neeley, a character who brings a unique perspective to the unfolding drama.
